example.eg: The author did not approve of the proofreader's text revisions.
example.egtrans: 作者不赞同校对人对文本的修订。

example.eg: The proofreader's revision of the text took several days.
example.egtrans: 校对人花费了好今天修订文本。

dsense.name: revision
dsense.guideword: UK, uncountable (review of lessons before exam)

example.eg: Carol has exams in several subjects and has a lot of revision to do.
example.egtrans: 卡罗尔有好几门课要考试，要复习的东西很多。

example.eg: The latest revision contains a lot of information that wasn't in the previous version.
This revision provides a fix for some common problems with the previous version.
